review_blob: Pours a yellow body with small white head. The taste is very citrusy because of the lime with a slight taste of tequila no real typical beer taste at all. Not exactly a beer more like a breezer maybe? I did enjoy it but its definitely not a beer ill have often

Had this out of a multipack can and it just wasnt good at all. It gave it an aluminium taste, its watery and has a very bland taste not much too it really! It pours yellow with a massive foamy head. It didnt go down to well for me I just didnt enjoy it at all.

It has a yellowish look with a slight head to it. It isnt a beer which has a lot of taste it must be said but I find it refreshing. Very carbonated, I would buy this beer for things like parties its easy to find in large amounts and is a very drinkable beer but compared to other beers the taste is probably its biggest let down as it is watered down A LOT.

355ml Bottle. I really enjoyed this beer, I thought it had quite a bit of flavour to it mostly from the coriander spicing which is also very apparent in the aroma. Its very fizzy at first which at first takes away from the taste until it has calmed down. It goes down easy and is very smooth and light overall I enjoyed it will definitely be having another bottle!
